query:
2. Consider the following pairs :
Port Well known as
1. Kamarajar Port: First major port in India registered as a company.
2. Mundra Port : Largest privately owned port in India
3. Visakhapatnam: Largest container port in India
Port
How many of the above pairs are correctly matched?
(a) Only one pair
(b) Only two pairs
(c) All three pairs
(d) None of the pairs

solution_notes.summary: The solution involves evaluating the correctness of the given pairs of ports and their well-known attributes. It checks if Kamarajar Port is the first major port registered as a company, Mundra Port is the largest privately owned port in India, and Visakhapatnam is the largest container port in India.

sections.title: Kamarajar Port: First Major Port Registered as a Company

content.text: Kamarajar Port, formerly known as Ennore Port, is indeed the first major port in India to be registered as a company.
This port is located on the Coromandel Coast, near Chennai, Tamil Nadu.
The port operates as a public company with the government holding a majority stake.

sections.slide_layout: Title slide with bullet points highlighting Kamarajar Port's status as the first corporatized major port.

assessment_questions.concept_to_be_assessed: Understanding Kamarajar Port's unique status and location.

sections.title: Mundra Port: Largest Privately Owned Port in India

content.text: Mundra Port is recognized as the largest privately owned port in India.
It is located in Gujarat and has significantly contributed to India's maritime trade.
It is known for its large capacity and modern infrastructure.

sections.slide_layout: A slide detailing Mundra Port's significance as the largest private port with key facts.

assessment_questions.concept_to_be_assessed: Recognizing Mundra Port's ownership and contribution to trade.

sections.title: Visakhapatnam Port: Largest Container Port in India

content.text: Jawaharlal Nehru Port (Nhava Sheva) is the largest container port in India, not Visakhapatnam Port.
Visakhapatnam Port is a major port on the east coast of India, known for handling diverse cargo.

sections.slide_layout: A slide clarifying the status of Visakhapatnam Port versus Jawaharlal Nehru Port in terms of container handling capacity.

assessment_questions.concept_to_be_assessed: Distinguishing between major ports and their specific capacities.

sections.title: Conclusion

content.text: Kamarajar Port is the first major port registered as a company.
Mundra Port is the largest privately owned port in India.
Jawaharlal Nehru Port, not Visakhapatnam Port, is the largest container port in India.

sections.slide_layout: Summary slide highlighting the correct matches and correcting the mismatch regarding Visakhapatnam Port.

assessment_questions.concept_to_be_assessed: Recalling the specific attributes of major Indian ports.

correct_answer_descriptions: Kamarajar Port is the first major port registered as a company, and Mundra Port is the largest privately owned port in India. Visakhapatnam Port is not the largest container port; Jawaharlal Nehru Port is.

accuracy_through_sources: Ministry of Ports, Shipping and Waterways official website
accuracy_proof: Confirmed that Kamarajar Port is the first corporatized major port from the India Year Book.
Verified Mundra Port's status as the largest private port from the Ministry of Ports, Shipping and Waterways.
Confirmed Jawaharlal Nehru Port as the largest container port from the Economic Survey.
missing_content: Details on recent developments or capacity expansions in these ports.
